text: James G. Lippert (January 13, 1917 - August 16, 2010)'Social Security Death Index' was an American politician and lawyer. Born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, Lippert served in the United States Navy during World War II. He received his bachelor's and law degrees from Marquette University. Lippert practiced law in Milwaukee, Wisconsin and was in the real estate business. Lippert served in the Wisconsin State Assembly and was a Democrat.'Wisconsin Blue Book 1956,' Biographical Sketch of James G. Lippert, pg. 52 ==Notes== Category:1917 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Politicians from Milwaukee Category:Marquette University alumni Category:Marquette University Law School alumni Category:Military personnel from Milwaukee Category:Businesspeople from Milwaukee Category:Wisconsin lawyers Category:Wisconsin Democrats Category:Members of the Wisconsin State Assembly Category:Lawyers from Milwaukee
title: James G. Lippert
